title: Lolclient.exe has stopped working
body:
So I just updated to patch 6.14 and anytime after I click launch the client will then go black and windows is telling me that the program has stopped working.  Did a complete uninstall and reinstall and still the same problem persists.
Running Windows 10, any help would be great.

Thanks

replies.body: While the issue your experiencing could be caused by permissions, the black screen might also suggest a connection issue blocking assets from being downloaded.  I recommend going over our [connection troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to see if your network is getting through to our servers.  If the issue persists, please let me know and we can take another look.
I have tried everything that has been suggested but the same problem has persisted.  I thought it might be just a problem with the patch but even after 6.15 the problem persists.

I'm having the same problem. If I uninstall the update "KB3172985" everything is fine but then windows updates itself and the problem is back.
Disable UAC did not fix it either
I had the same problem.  Uninstalled KB3172985 and now everything works.  What's up with KB3172985?

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) Proceed to the steps you haven't yet performed.
